name: hocofi

stmt.origin: mp2an(wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba), wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba))

body.origin:
|- wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(c0, chba, chba)
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)
-| wi(wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba)), wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(c0, chba, chba)
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)
-| wi(wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba)), wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba)), wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(ccom(c0, c1), chba, chba)
-| wf(c0, chba, chba)
-| wf(c1, chba, chba)

comment: Mapping of composition of Hilbert space operators. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
